however in 2010 the group got back

you know
godspeed has just kind of continued to

without saying that this album has a lot

every project godspeed has ever put out

but if any band is naturally equipped to

snares arise out of the fog of noise
some downstroke guitar chords kind of

it's no secret at this point in the

against political and social injustice

clear in this music in the same way

maybe it's a bit of a

a bit similar the first movement has

they're just hammering on these

I do think each part separately at least

presents the
intensity grit beauty melodic

hopefully soon we'll see the band again
